member.name: M:Xyaneon.Games.Cards.DrawPile`1.Draw(System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws the specified number of cards from this .

member.returns: The drawn cards in the order in which they were drawn.
member.exception: exceeds the current number of cards stored in this .

member.name: M:Xyaneon.Games.Cards.DrawPile`1.DrawAll
member.summary: Draws all cards from this .
member.returns: The drawn cards in the order in which they were drawn.
member.remarks: After this method is called, this will be empty.

member.name: M:Xyaneon.Games.Cards.DrawPile`1.DrawAtMost(System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws the specified number of cards from this if able, or all of the cards in this if the current number of cards it currently holds is less than that.
member.param: The maximum number of cards to draw.
member.returns: The drawn cards in the order in which they were drawn. If this is empty at the time of the call, then the returned collection will also be empty.

member.summary: Inserts a single into this at the specified .

member.exception: is less than zero. -or- is greater than this object's current number of cards.

member.summary: The base method for shuffling the cards stored in this object. The must always be specified.
member.param: The delegate to use which implements the desired shuffling algorithm.

member.param: The collection of cards to shuffle into this .
The delegate to use which implements the desired shuffling algorithm.

remarks.para: This method assumes that the parameter supplied was already checked to not be by the caller.
The supplied can just be the method defined within this class for default behavior, such as when called by the public method. However, an alternative can be supplied when needed.
